data.name: Serpent Spine
data.passiveDescription: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal {{6//7//8//9//10%}} more DMG and take {{3//2.7//2.4//2.2//2%}} more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
